components.name: qnNciV
components.content:
In this section, we'll ask about:

  • how you will make sure team members engage with other parts of the organisation
  • how you will share the progress of the work across the organisation

pages.title: How will you make sure team members engage with other parts of your organisation?

components.name: bpzrMJ
components.title: How will you make sure team members engage with other parts of your organisation?
components.hint:
We expect you to regularly engage with:
  • planning departments
  • transformation departments
  • data departments
  • GIS (geographical information system) teams
  • senior leadership
  • information technology teams
